DOC.brief_summary: To collect and summarize information on the diagnosis, management, and clinical and mycological outcomes of patients with systemic fungal infections in order to better understand the effectiveness of antifungals in the treatment of Systemic Fungal Infections (SFI) in India.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Indian Patients Receiving Therapy For Systemic Fungal Infections
DOC.criteria: To be eligible for enrollment in the study database, patients must have received (in the Intensive Care Unit [ICU] at study entry) at least 1 day therapy with systemic antifungal agent for treatment of a proven or suspected fungal infection.
